vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to increase the service contract with Convergint Technologies LLC, for continued maintenance and support for the existing airport access control system at Dallas Love Field for the Department of Aviation - Not to exceed $225,488.41, from $8,047,001.92 to $8,272,490.33 - Financing: Aviation Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
